document_data.name: Symylazarr
document_data.mainbody: '''Symylazarr''' (the '''Fount of Honor''') was an ancient rune-engraved blade with a pommel in the shape of a [[dragon|dragon's]] head.
document_data.History: The sword was used ceremonially around [[376 DR]] by leaders of noble houses to swear allegiance to the king of [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Uses: The High Wizard [[Vangerdahast]] was able to summon and dismiss the blade at will.
